DOC.brief_title: Positive Airway Pressure Pleural Effusion After Drainage
DOC.criteria: age 18 year presence pleural effusion undergone chest drain few 24 hour contraindication use noninvasive equipment generates positive airway pressure ( : intolerance , phobia , drowsiness , restlessness , confusion , hemodynamic instability require vasopressor therapy , systolic blood pressure < 90 mmHg , facial trauma , ineffective cough inability swallow , nausea vomiting , upper gastrointestinal bleeding , acute myocardial infarction within last 48 hour , pneumothorax bullous emphysema )
